Posts.Content:
I'm 5 weeks post-op after mastectomy and tram flap reconstruction.  I have an 
open wound under the reconstruction that is slow to heal.  My surgeon has me using silvadene cream 3 times a day and he tells me that it will heal, very slowly.  Has anyone had this problem?  How long did it take?  Thanks,
